title: My grandmother has alzehimers and can no longer pay her bills what should i do to notify credit card companys?
question: She only has retirement, social security and she lives in alzheimers residence now. Should I file Chapter 7 on her behalf if I have power of attorney, she has about 40,000 in credit card debt.
